title: Christopher A. Wray
deleted: In November 2020, former [[Counselor to the President|White House chief strategist]] [[Steve Bannon]] said he would like for Wray, along with [[Anthony Fauci]], to be beheaded, saying he would "put the heads on pikes, right. I'd put them at the two corners of the White House as a warning to federal bureaucrats. You either get with the program or you're gone."<ref>{{cite news |title=Steve Bannon Calls for the Beheading of Dr. Fauci on Podcast |url=https://www.newsweek.com/bannon-calls-fauci-beheading-1545287 |work=Newsweek |date=November 5, 2020}}</ref>
